segments.text: I can't believe the mess that's being made in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are making things worse by sneaking cookies and creating a potential hazard with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness and lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take control of the situation before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really upset by the lack of responsibility being shown here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage if it's not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't understand how they can all be so oblivious to what's happening around them.
segments.speaker: PAR
